traits.Keen Hearing and Smell: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
traits.Pack Tactics: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
traits.Snow Camouflage: The wolf has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.
